feature_defs.trigger: when you hit a creature with a weapon
effects: You can deal an extra 1d4 psychic damage; a creature can take this extra damage only once per turn.
The extra damage increases to 1d6 at Ranger level 11.
You always have the spells in the Fey Wanderer Spells table prepared at the ranger levels shown.
You also gain a Feywild Gift (choose or roll on the Feywild Gifts table).

feature_defs.trigger: when you make a Charisma check
effects: You gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1).
You also gain proficiency in one of the following skills: Deception, Performance, or Persuasion.

feature_defs.trigger: when you or a creature you can see within 120 feet succeeds on a save to avoid or end the Charmed or Frightened condition
effects: You can force a different creature you can see within 120 feet to make a Wisdom save against your spell save DC.
On a failed save, the target is Charmed or Frightened (your choice) for 1 minute; it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
limits: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed or Frightened condition.
notes: saving throw DC formula noted in effects

effects: You can cast Summon Fey without a material component.
You can cast it without concentration; if you do, the duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.
limits: You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain this use when you finish a long rest.

effects: You can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot.
You can bring one willing creature within 5 feet to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of your destination.
limits: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
